      void closeQCMView()

      void displayNextQuestion()
      This method will get the next question, then refreshes the view so the question can be displayed with its values ( content , responses , time .. )

      This method will order the view to stop the current Chronometre ( meaning stopping the Timer )

      This method will update the Chronometre with the new Value
